archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0501
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to turn off the approval process for chargeable activity, so that I don't have to be bothered with approving charges if I'm happy for my card to be automatically charged.

properties.value: Is the approval process still considered? It was not mentioned during micropurchases workshop. Yes it’s needed on calls so you don’t get an IVR message every time and for some SMS scenarios, such as customer sending a text to China without the relevant add-on. Are there approvals for SMSes?
SC, PC, PIM, OCS, CNS, OM

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
